ttp_template:
<group name="dhcp_dpdk_interface_ipv6_address">
 ip-info ipv4_address {{SECONDARY_IP_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}}
 ip-info link-local ipv6 address fe80{{IPV6_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}}9474:baff:fe6b:904d
 ip-info mac_address  {{MAC_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}}
 ip-info mtu  {{MTU | ORPHRASE}}
 vlan tag {{VLAN_TAG | ORPHRASE}}
 dhcp {{DHCP | ORPHRASE}}
 dpdk-enabled {{DPDK | ORPHRASE}}
bridge-settings {{NAME | ORPHRASE}}
 ip-info ipv4_address {{IP_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}}
 ip-info netmask {{NETMASK | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
bridge-settings wan-br
 ip-info interface    wan-br
 ip-info ipv4_address 0.0.0.0
 ip-info netmask      0.0.0.0
 ip-info link-local ipv6 address fe80::9474:baff:fe6b:904d
 ip-info link-local ipv6 prefixlen 64
 ip-info global ipv6 address ::
 ip-info global ipv6 prefixlen 0
 ip-info mac_address  9c:d5:ff:ff:ff:ff
 ip-info mtu          9216
 ip-info txqueuelen   1000
 ip-info secondary-ip 0.0.0.0
 ip-info secondary-ip-netmask 0.0.0.0
 stats rx_packets 31866
 stats rx_bytes 1465956
 stats rx_errors 0
 stats rx_dropped 0
 stats rx_overruns 0
 stats rx_frame 0
 stats tx_packets 5
 stats tx_bytes 446
 stats tx_errors 0
 stats tx_dropped 0
 stats tx_overruns 0
 stats tx_carrier 0
 stats tx_collisions 0
 vlan tag untagged
 dhcp disabled
 dhcp-ipv6 disabled
 slaac-ipv6 disabled
 dpdk-enabled false
bridge-settings lan-br
 ip-info interface lan-br
 ip-info ipv4_address 11.22.33.44
 ip-info netmask 255.255.255.240
 ip-info link-local ipv6 address fe80::5808:76ff:fea9:ca44
 ip-info link-local ipv6 prefixlen 64
 ip-info global ipv6 address ::
 ip-info global ipv6 prefixlen 0
 ip-info mac_address 9c:d5:ff:ff:ff:ff
 ip-info mtu  9216
 ip-info txqueuelen 1000
 stats rx_packets 10965426
 stats rx_bytes 1612107737
 stats rx_errors 0
 stats rx_dropped 0
 stats rx_overruns 0
 stats rx_frame 0
 stats tx_packets 10390988
 stats tx_bytes 1976951266
 stats tx_errors 0
 stats tx_dropped 0
 stats tx_overruns 0
 stats tx_carrier 0
 stats tx_collisions 0
 vlan tag untagged
 dhcp disabled
 dhcp-ipv6 disabled
 slaac-ipv6 disabled
 dpdk-enabled false
